title: Python for Beginners
description: Learn Python from scratch with hands-on examples and mini projects designed for absolute beginners.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: A complete web development guide covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend fundamentals.

title: React Mastery
description: Master React.js with hooks, components, state management, and real-world project integration.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Understand the fundamentals of machine learning including supervised and unsupervised learning.

title: UI/UX Design Essentials
description: Learn the key principles of user interface and user experience design with modern tools.

title: Java Programming Advanced
description: Explore advanced Java programming concepts including multithreading, collections, and OOP design patterns.

title: Digital Marketing 101
description: Get started with SEO, social media, and content marketing strategies to grow your business.

title: Data Structures in C++
description: Learn core data structures in C++ such as arrays, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs with implementation.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Understand the basics of cloud computing and start using AWS services like EC2, S3, and Lambda.

title: Graphic Design with Canva
description: Create stunning social media posts, flyers, and presentations using Canva's drag-and-drop interface.
